actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the electric motor vehicle credit, including an expansion of the credit to certain 3-wheeled vehicles.
short_title: Wider Incentives for Non-Gasoline Small Electric Vehicles Act of 2002

summary.text: Wider Incentives for Non-Gasoline Small Electric Vehicles Act of 2002 or the WINGS EV Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, concerning the electric motor vehicle credit, to: (1) redefine the term "qualified electric vehicle"; (2) increase the credit according to vehicle type; (3) make the credit available for leased vehicles and three wheeled vehicles; and (4) extend the credit three additional years.

titles.title: Wider Incentives for Non-Gasoline Small Electric Vehicles Act of 2002
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the electric motor vehicle credit, including an expansion of the credit to certain 3-wheeled vehicles.
